jobs.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: Build scalable frontend applications using React and Next.js.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with React and Next.js
Strong proficiency in TypeScript
Experience with state management libraries (Redux, Zustand)
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

jobs.title: Backend Engineer (Node.js)
jobs.description: Develop and optimize server-side applications using Node.js and Express.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Experience with cloud services (AWS, GCP)
Understanding of microservices architecture
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.description: Design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for SaaS products.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, and Adobe Suite
Strong understanding of UI/UX principles
Experience with user research and A/B testing
qualifications: Degree in Design or related field

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Manage CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure automation.
requirements: Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
Proficiency in Terraform and AWS services
Understanding of CI/CD pipelines

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Analyze data to drive business insights and product improvements.
requirements: Experience with Python, SQL, and machine learning frameworks
Ability to work with large datasets
Strong statistical and analytical skills
qualifications: Master’s or PhD in Data Science, Mathematics, or related field

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Engineer
jobs.description: Secure enterprise networks and cloud environments.
requirements: Experience with penetration testing and vulnerability assessments
Knowledge of cloud security best practices
Proficiency in Python or Bash scripting

jobs.title: AI Research Engineer
jobs.description: Develop and optimize AI models for various applications.
requirements: Experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and deep learning models
Knowledge of NLP and computer vision
Strong mathematical background in statistics and linear algebra
qualifications: PhD in AI, Computer Science, or related field

jobs.title: Mobile Engineer (React Native)
jobs.description: Develop and optimize mobile applications using React Native.
requirements: Experience with React Native and TypeScript
Understanding of mobile performance optimization
Familiarity with Expo and native modules

jobs.title: Blockchain Developer
jobs.description: Develop decentralized applications and smart contracts.
requirements: Experience with Solidity and Ethereum smart contracts
Understanding of DeFi protocols
Proficiency in Rust or Go
qualifications: Previous experience in blockchain projects preferred

jobs.title: Technical Writer
jobs.description: Create technical documentation for developers and users.
requirements: Experience writing API documentation
Ability to explain complex topics clearly
Familiarity with Markdown and Git
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in English, CS, or related field
